channel.title: newsletter on MapLibre
channel.description: Recent content in newsletter on MapLibre

item.title: MapLibre Newsletter April 2023
item.description: MapLibre Newsletter - April 2023 Highlights Komoot joined the MapLibre Sponsorship Program as a Silver Sponsor. Welcome komoot, we are glad to have you in the MapLibre community!

item.title: MapLibre Newsletter March 2023
item.description: MapLibre Newsletter - March 2023 General Bounty Program We invite you to share feedback on what features and improvements in MapLibre GL JS and MapLibre GL Native would be helpful for you.

item.title: MapLibre Newsletter February 2023
item.description: MapLibre Newsletter - February 2023 General We have successfully registered the MapLibre trademark in the US and in the EU . Open Source Collective, our fiscal host, holds the MapLibre trademarks.
